reviews.review: Best game ever. Period. "10/10 would play again" - IGN

Half Life 2 halala
Bon alors pour commencer Half life 2 est l'un des meilleurs jeux auquel j'ai pu joué.

Le jeu reste bon malgré son âge avec de bon graphique un bon gameplay et l'une des meilleurs histoire du monde du jeu vidéo.

Half Life 2 est la suite de Half Life mais on peut très bien y joué sans avoir joué au premier (mais jouer lau premier car il est tout aussi excellent.)

le jeu est très bon et comporte peu de bug quand on joue normalement (sans faire de ABH et en faisant juste l'histoire.) 

plusieurs personne n'aime pas le jeu mais comme j'ai dit dans mon évaluation de Half life ce sont souvent des 2000 qui sont déçus des graphisme (ils ont l'habitude de graphisme tel que BO4.)

En plus de tout ça on comprend assez facilement l'histoire (ce qui n'es pas le car de tout les jeu)

bref Half-Life 2 est un excellent jeu que je trouve largement mieux que certain jeu qui sorte en ce moment (2019 / 2020) avec de bon graphique et une très bonne histoire.

Rise and shine, Mr Freeman
Rise and shine

Not that I wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job, no one is more deserving of a rest and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste if... well, let's just say your time has come again

The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world

Wake up Mr Freeman. Wake up and... smell the ashes

If the fact that I have memorised this just by playing it isn't enough then I don't know what is.
Обзор для летней распродажи, но игра пушка(что и так давно всем известно)

Half-Life 2. The second game after Half-Life, bringing you to Europe. Its a very fun game with its FPS gameplay. Each weapon feels powerful and useful in almost all situations. I've completed the game a few times, legitimately and not but every time it has been a fun experience looking for easter eggs.

Half-Life 2 is a timeless game that follows a decent plot and narrative with minimal breaks from gameplay. There are few cutscenes, and dialogue is carried out without ripping the controls away from you, which is nice. The game is very long, and enjoyable the entire time, bringing in new abilities and elements that continue to be important throughout the game. It includes good physics, and a weapon called the gravity gun, something full of possibility and utilized to its utmost capacity. This is a very impressive game that many recommend, as it leaves the player more satisfied than most newer games.
